amendment.description: To prevent the denial of access to records and documents by various inspectors general.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2971 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 136.

action.text: Amendment SA 2971 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4265-4272; text: CR S4265) To prevent the denial of access to records and documents by various inspectors general.
